rook.api.transport

Interface AnnounceTransport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleAnnounceTransport

    public interface AnnounceTransport
    Transport for service announcement and probes
    Author:
    Eric Thill

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAnnouncementConsumer(java.util.function.Consumer<RID> consumer)
      Add a consumer for announcement messages
      void incognito_announce(RID service)

      • probe

        void probe()
        Send a probe for all service's that are currently online.

      • incognito_announce

        void incognito_announce(RID service)
        Send a service announcement on behalf of another service. This method is intended to be used by services that are able to connect multiple routers into a single environment.
        Parameters:
        service - The ID of the service being announced
